title: Episode 203: Ghost Cats and Night Owls with Natasha Tarpley
itunes:title: Episode 203: Ghost Cats and Night Owls with Natasha Tarpley
description:
Kate is reborn after a successful trip to Costco and Doree continues to ride the covid rollercoaster at home. Then, Natasha Tarpley, author of I Love My Hair, chats with them about growing up in a home filled with stories and no bedtime, living with the ghosts of her beloved cats, and the inspiration behind her stunning new children’s book The Me I Choose To Be. 


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter.
